entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
